public class HateoasErrorResponseProcessor

    • Method Detail

      • processResponse

        @NonNull
public MutableHttpResponse<JsonError> processResponse(@NonNull
                                                               ErrorContext errorContext,
                                                               @NonNull
                                                               MutableHttpResponse<?> response)
        Description copied from interface: ErrorResponseProcessor
        Modifies the http response representing the error. Callers of this method should return the response that was passed in , however that isn't required. Error response processors should not set the body or content type if the request method is HEAD.
        Specified by:
        processResponse in interface ErrorResponseProcessor<JsonError>
        Parameters:
        errorContext - The error context
        response - The base response to retrieve information or mutate
        Returns:
        An error response
